items.name: Bruschetta
items.description: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic, topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

items.name: Calamari Fritti
items.description: Crispy fried calamari served with marinara sauce and lemon aioli.

items.name: Soup of the Day
items.description: Chef's daily creation made with fresh, seasonal ingredients. Ask your server for today's selection.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and house-made Caesar dressing.

items.name: Grilled Salmon
items.description: Pan-seared Atlantic salmon with lemon butter sauce, seasonal vegetables, and wild rice pilaf.

items.name: Filet Mignon
items.description: 8oz center-cut beef tenderloin, served with truffle mashed potatoes and red wine reduction.

items.name: Garden Risotto
items.description: Creamy arborio rice with roasted seasonal vegetables, parmesan, and fresh herbs.

items.name: Thai Coconut Curry
items.description: Spicy coconut curry with tofu, vegetables, and jasmine rice. Vegan and nut-free preparation.

items.name: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara and melted mozzarella, served with spaghetti.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Seasonal Fruit Sorbet
items.description: Refreshing house-made sorbet featuring the season's finest fruits.

items.name: House Red Wine
items.description: Glass of our carefully selected house red wine.

items.name: House White Wine
items.description: Glass of our refreshing house white wine.

items.name: Craft Cocktail
items.description: Ask your server about our rotating selection of handcrafted cocktails.

items.name: Fresh Lemonade
items.description: House-made lemonade with fresh-squeezed lemons and a hint of mint.
